title: 125: Creating Passive Income Doing What You Love with Cathy Heller
itunes:title: 125: Creating Passive Income Doing What You Love with Cathy Heller
description:
If you are a creative and not sure how you can monetize your business while staying aligned with your truth, this episode is for you. Cathy, host of Don’t Keep Your Day Job Podcast, shares with us how she turned her song-writing into a multiple 7-figure business and how overcoming her inner money blocks were what changed EVERYTHING for her.

Join me on my brand-new Abundance Mindset Masterclass where we will break through your money blocks that are holding you back from living a life of freedom, purpose and joy. This is a much-requested class after my abundance podcasts and I’m so excited to be teaching you the very lessons that have totally shifted my life. The masterclass includes an interactive live webinar with me and isand just $35.

Join at abundancemindsetmasterclass.com

Get 35% off your order of Youveda supplements at youveda.com with code “sahara”

Try Teami Blends Detox tea program and use code SAHARA for 25% off any order $49.99 over on teamiblends.com

Receive 60$ off your first 3 boxes of Hello Fresh at hellofresh.com/sahara60

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Discover Your Dosha (Mind-Body Type) with my free quiz: iamsahararose.com

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at Instagram: @iamsahararose Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Pre-order my new book Eat Feel Fresh: A Contemporary Plant-Based Ayurvedic Cookbook: https://eatfeelfresh.com/book/ and receive a signed book plate, inspirational card and 10 bonus recipes

Join my Awaken Your Powers Masterclass to become a leader in the new paradigm with Shaman Durek: https://www.iamsahararose.com/awaken-your-powers
